sentences.sContent: Participation in the program would be voluntary and participants could prepay the government loan at any time.
sentences.sContent_eng: Participation in the program would be voluntary and participants could prepay the government loan at any time.
sentences.sCn: 参加这以项目是自愿的，参与者可以在任何时间将贷款预付给政府。

sentences.sContent: This time, thanks to the card, I had managed to prove knowledge of where I was going and was spared the hassle of having to pick and prepay for a state-operated hotel at the airport.
sentences.sContent_eng: This time, thanks to the card, I had managed to prove knowledge of where I was going and was spared the hassle of having to pick and prepay for a state-operated hotel at the airport.
sentences.sCn: 多亏了这张卡片，这一次，我在机场清楚了自己该往哪儿走，省下了挑选、预付国有宾馆的麻烦。

sentences.sContent: In their previous hosting service they had to prepay for a month at a time
sentences.sContent_eng: In their previous hosting service they had to prepay for a month at a time
sentences.sCn: 在之前的托管服务上，我们必须要预付一个月的费用。

words.tran: 预付（prepay的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tranOther: to pay for something before you need it or use it
